headline: England Women’s U-19s net ten against Lithuania
summary: England overran tournament hosts Lithuania in their opening group game at the UEFA Women’s U-19 Championship. John Griffiths’ side raced into a three-goal lead inside quarter of an hour, Poppy Pritchard following up a parry […]

headline: Women’s international friendlies feature Olympic warm-ups
summary: Among the Olympics warm-up friendlies, Sunderland’s Katie Kitching scored for New Zealand and Canada came from behind to beat Australia.  Kitching netted a 67th-minute penalty to earn New Zealand a 1-1 draw with Zambia, who […]

headline: Denmark, France and Iceland qualify for UEFA Women’s EURO 2025
summary: Iceland beat Germany 3-0 to book their place at UEFA Women’s EURO 2025, Denmark and France also secured their berths. League A Group 1 – Finland 1-1 Norway, Netherlands 0-0 Italy Netherlands still lead their […]

headline: England Women see off Ireland to close in on Euro finals
summary: England’s 2-1 win over Republic of Ireland puts them within a point of qualifying for UEFA Women’s Euro 2025. A draw away to Sweden in the final games next Tuesday will keep the Lionesses above […]

headline: Wales Women point away from promotion after win in Croatia
summary: Wales are in a good position to win UEFA Women’s Euro Qualifying League B Group 4 after a 3-0 victory in Croatia. Avoiding defeat on Tuesday against Kosovo at Parc y Scarlets in Llanelli will […]

headline: Northern Ireland seal play-off place for Women’s Euro 2025
summary: Northern Ireland’s 2-0 win away to Malta secured them a play-off for Euro 2025 in Switzerland. The Maltese gifted the Irish an early goal, Emma Lipman conceding an own goal, as her back pass was […]

headline: Claire Emslie double sees Scotland Women stay top of group
summary: Scotland remained top of the UEFA Women’s Euro 2025 qualifying League B group, winning 2-0 in a weather-effected game in Slovakia. After a goalless first-half, Scotland took just 40 seconds to break the deadlock, Kirsty […]

headline: Remi Allen becomes Southampton FC Women’s new head coach
summary: Remi Allen is Southampton FC Women’s new head coach, after taking charge of London City Lionesses towards the end of last season. The 33-year-old lifted London City out of a relegation battle and has the […]

headline: Melvine Malard rejoins Manchester United Women
summary: Manchester United make the permanent signing of France international Melvine Malard on a three-year contract following last season’s loan from Lyon. The 24-year-old forward initially joined United on a season-long loan, making 29 appearances and […]

headline: West Ham Women sign Chile international defender Camila Sáez
summary: West Ham United sign 29-year-old Chile international Camila Sáez on a two-year contract, following the expiration of her deal at Madrid CFF. She has 71 caps for her country, including appearances in the World Cup […]
